thread.section_title: Hotel Forte - UPDATED 2016 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Home away from home in Rome
thread.title_full: Home away from home in Rome - Review of Hotel Forte, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Marsha F
title: Home away from home in Rome
text:
The room was clean, well appointed and the front desk staff were more than helpful,with any questions about places to visit, etc. We even received an upgrade to our room because of a funny odour in the room, due to the heavy rains. No questions asked, and done with a smile. The breakfast was good, everything you would need to get you started for a day in Rome. Would stay again in a heartbeat!
Room Tip: Get a room away from via Margutta, as it's much quieter. See more room tips
